The selected object is the background. Please recreate the point in the foreground range

Smear the area where the outline is not accurately predicted with a single finger, then click the "Update as target" button to update the painting area as the target object, or click the "Update as background" button to update it as background. You can also zoom and move pictures with double fingers to make it more accurate to update.
Define object: Draw a rectangle to cover the outline of the object you want to extract,and the object should be tightly covered by the rectangle.
The starting point or termination point is not within the valid range,
